scorecounter - Variable in class com.example.moelkky.Scoreboard
Simple counter that is used to remember how many scores are added per row, so that new rows will be created at right times
scores - Variable in class com.example.moelkky.GameScreen
ArrayList holding all scores that have been updated during throws
scores - Variable in class com.example.moelkky.Scoreboard
ArrayList to store all player scores, inherited from Intent that user created while calling for Scoreboard activity
scoretable - Variable in class com.example.moelkky.Scoreboard
Initiates to the lower TableLayout in XML layout file, this is the one in ScrollView where all the scores are added

String input of the second last throw player made
showGameOrder() - Method in class com.example.moelkky.GameScreen
Dialog showing the order of players Method creates AlertDialog to show the generated order in which players will play the game
startbutton - Variable in class com.example.moelkky.NewGame
Button for adding new players AddPlayer button initiates in OnCreate, on press it checks if user has add players, and either starts GameScreen, or prompts up alert dialog for too few players
startGame() - Method in class com.example.moelkky.NewGame
Calls GameScreen activity Method creates new Intent, adds the list of players to it and starts activity from GameScreen, it also applies, that when GameScreens activity finishes, also this activity finishes.
StartGame - Class in com.example.moelkky
The TitleScreen of the application.
